name: Pew Dew Redemption
detailed_description:
Dive into the dark, dystopian world of CHAOX. Its 2029, Free content creators have lost all hope in despair to defeat the evil "T" (TCRS, spoken TII-CEE-REES)
Take the role of a young aspiring, yet widely unknown content creator, Pew (basically a newbie) to defeat the growing manifestations of darkness.

Play as the young legendary content creator who is determined to defeat "TCRS".
Defeat the legions of the cooperate powerhouse and reclaim your status as the best content creator of the world.

short_description: Dive into the dark, dystopian world of CHAOX. Its 2029, Free content creators have lost all hope in despair to defeat the evil "T" (TCRS, spoken TII-CEE-REES) Take the role of a young aspiring, yet widely unknown content creator, Pew (basically a newbie) to defeat the growing manifestations of darkness.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3470 (or comparable AMD processor)
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX750 TI (or comparable Radeon Graphics Card)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1750 MB available space
